name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: Robert Kiyosaki’s book explains the fundamentals of financial literacy by comparing the mindsets of the rich and the poor.

name: Atomic Habits
description: James Clear’s 'Atomic Habits' reveals how small changes can lead to remarkable results. The book offers practical strategies to break bad habits and form good ones.

name: Fahrenheit 451
description: Ray Bradbury’s dystopian novel 'Fahrenheit 451' portrays a future society where books are banned and burned to suppress knowledge and freedom of thought.

name: The Miracle Morning
description: Hal Elrod’s 'The Miracle Morning' introduces a morning routine designed to transform your life before 8AM, increasing productivity and personal growth.

name: Deep Work
description: Deep work, as outlined by Cal Newport in his book Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World, refers to the practice of engaging in intense, uninterrupted cognitive work that demands deep concentration and creativity

name: The Alchemist
description: Paulo Coelho’s 'The Alchemist' is a philosophical novel about a young shepherd named Santiago who follows his dreams to discover his personal legend.
